channel.title: [Version 1] Milkman's Tool Pack [Version 1]
channel.description:
[center]Hello, Moparscape. This weekend I started and finished a tool pack based off of Mendorphins'. Inside the pack you will find tutorials, handlers, snippets, useful information and tools. I hope this gets more people excited about developing Runescape Private Servers.[/center]
Download Link: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?nhn5wc4lhf2han4]Milkman's Tool Pack.rar [187mb][/url]
[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/1529/beginnertoolpack.jpg[/img] [img]http://img88.imageshack.us/img88/5356/liststoolpack.jpg[/img] [img]http://img809.imageshack.us/img809/342/maintoolpack.jpg[/img] [img]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/1271/serverstoolpack.jpg[/img] [img]http://img830.imageshack.us/img830/8054/toolstoolpack.jpg[/img] [img]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/4690/tutorialstoolpack.jpg[/img]
The pictures above are all the new stuff I added to Mendorphins'.
If you have any ideas for Version 2, please feel free to pm me.
Constructive criticism is [b]encouraged[/b]! Flaming is [b]not[/b]!
-Milkman
Leave feedback or I will remove this...

item.title: [Version 1] Milkman's Tool Pack [Version 1]
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:32, topic:399980”][quote author=JavaTC link=topic=497081.msg3744549#msg3744549 date=1315640474]
2 Exes from tools were detected as a virus for me, one is the Decompiler, witch is common, and some exe called “File Deleter” or something.

OT: Nice job, going to see what I can learn from some of this.
[/quote]
It’s the same decompiler going around for everyone… it’s fine.

File Deleter is part of the decompiler and is perfectly safe. How do I know? Go to folder options and “show hidden folders”, then go to the decompiler and check the hidden batch folder and check the batch file that gets called when the .exe is executed.[/quote]

Yeah I figured that out, I just didn’t know what the 2nd exe was. It was worth downloading just to hear the old 317 Runescape Theme (scape-main). It’s so much better than the new one. As well as many other of the old songs brought back memories of the good old days.

Thanks for these wonderful tools. They will help me in my project.

Read full topic

item.title: [Version 1] Milkman's Tool Pack [Version 1]
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:31, topic:399980”]2 Exes from tools were detected as a virus for me, one is the Decompiler, witch is common, and some exe called “File Deleter” or something.

OT: Nice job, going to see what I can learn from some of this.[/quote]
It’s the same decompiler going around for everyone… it’s fine.

File Deleter is part of the decompiler and is perfectly safe. How do I know? Go to folder options and “show hidden folders”, then go to the decompiler and check the hidden batch folder and check the batch file that gets called when the .exe is executed.

Read full topic

item.description:

Mendorphins:

If people are saying it’s too big, Milk, use 7z compressor and use the ultra setting. I could compress a 150MB file into about 30MBs.

^
Also, I might be able to post a virus scan if you truly need. I could download the file in about two minutes :rolleyes:
